thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: LB-Shell TO Implement Continuation Option, Appoints New Board

author: Reuters Editorial
title: LB-Shell TO Implement Continuation Option, Appoints New Board
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - LB-Shell PLC:
* UPDATE ON CONTINUATION OPTION AND DIRECTORATE CHANGES * HAS NOW DECIDED THAT IT IS IN BEST INTERESTS OF SHAREHOLDERS TO LOOK TO IMPLEMENT THE CONTINUATION OPTION
* CONTINUATION OPTION IS EXPECTED TO INVOLVE COMPANY BUYING, INVESTING IN BUSINESS WHICH IS AT THIS POINT UNIDENTIFIED
* NEW BOARD HAS BEEN APPOINTED TO PURSUE CONTINUATION OPTION
* CURRENT BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE STANDING DOWN AS DIRECTORS WITH IMMEDIATE EFFECT
* NEW BOARD WILL BE SUBJECT TO REAPPOINTMENT AT NEXT AGM Source text for Eikon:
Our
